definitionGroups.group: superlative form of far: most far

entries.meaning: Most distant in time, space or degree.
examples: The furthest known galaxy is about 13 billion light years from Earth.

definitionGroups.group: superlative form of far: most far

entries.meaning: To, at or over the greatest distance in space, time or other extent.
examples: Of all the children in our school, I can run furthest.
He lives furthest from the office, so his commute is the longest.

entries.meaning: To the greatest degree or extent.
examples: This civilisation was the furthest advanced.
